author.organization: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

abstract.t: This document registers COSE algorithm code points for using the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in Cipher-based Message Authentication Code (CMAC) mode for use in CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE) messages. The CMAC mode of operation is an alternative to AES-CBC-MAC which is approved by US NIST FIPS 140.
